mcq.statement: Which king dispatched a ship to the governor of Iraq, Hajjaj bin Yousaf?
mcq.one_liner: The king of **Ceylon (present-day Sri Lanka)** dispatched a ship to the governor of Iraq, Hajjaj bin Yousaf.
